newsitem.title: UK: Japanese stocks mixed in London, banks featured.
newsitem.headline: Japanese stocks mixed in London, banks featured.

text.p: Japanese bank shares firmed in London in otherwise featureless dealings, dealers said.
They noted light bargain hunting in the bank sector, hit since last July by worries about bad loans.
But light profit-taking in some blue chip issues contributed to a 23.53 point decline to 1,430.74 in the Nikkei 50 index in London
In Tokyo, the benchmark Nikkei 225 index fell 217.62, or 1.23 percent, to 17,485.75. --London Newsroom +44 171 542 5106
